CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 3, 1954, pg. 4, reads: "No Second Mistake - Last time grocer Alfred Blair was held up, he looked like this in the hospital. This time Mr. Blair was ready for the hold-up men and blasted one of them in the collar bone. - Harris Photo." Portion of accompanying article reads: "...About three years ago, another pair of hoodlums robbed and beat him badly..."
TitMainTitle: Alfred Blair with injuries on face after being beaten and robbed at his confectionery store, wrapped in blanket on gurney in hospital
